#Instructions for building 64 bit static QT

= Requirements =
MSVC 2010

= Downloading =

  # Download [http://download.qt.nokia.com/qt/source/qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.7.4.zip qt-everywhere-opensource-src-4.7.4.zip]
  # Unzip and rename parent folder to C:\Qt\x64-MSVC-2010-static-4.7.4\
  # Download and unpack [ftp://ftp.qt.nokia.com/jom/jom.zip jom]  to C:\Qt\jom\

= Building =
Open the `Visual Studion x64 Win64 Command Prompt (2010)` from Start >> Microsoft Visual Studio 2010 >> Visual Studio Tools >> Vistual Studio x64 Win64 Command Promt (2010) and run:

{{{
cd C:\Qt\x64-MSVC-2010-static-4.7.4
set QTDIR="C:\Qt\x64-MSVC-2010-static-4.7.4"
set QMAKESPEC="win32-msvc2010"
configure -debug-and-release -opensource -platform win32-msvc2010 -static -nomake demos -nomake examples -no-qt3support -qt-zlib -qt-gif -qt-libpng -qt-libmng -qt-libtiff -qt-libjpeg
y
..\jom\jom.exe
}}}
